title: 1270Stunning admission on the Senate floor as Sen. Dick Durbin (D) announces Democrats privately KNE
content:
1270 Stunning admission on the Senate floor as Sen. Dick Durbin (D) announces Democrats privately KNEW they were about to starve children and cause even more harm to Americans by shutting down the government. posted 2 days ago by kek_saved_the_world 89 comments award share report block Eric Daugherty @EricLDaugh • 2d 🚨 JUST NOW: Stunning admission on the Senate floor as Sen. Dick Durbin (D) announces Democrats privately KNEW they were about to starve children and cause even more harm to Americans by shutting down the government. Wow. They are cooked. https://t.co/e8s0kwGuim "[I] cannot
89 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save redditadminssuckit 68 points 2 days ago I think the bigger headline is that literally said shutting down the government was all about protesting Trump. permalink award report block reply EgregiousPhilbin 27 points 2 days ago And if people starve, so be it. They probably weren't anti Trump enough anyway. These people are insane. But wait, there's more. They will be taking that one away when they get any power. permalink parent award report block reply Klaus73 3 points 2 days ago I mean tactically they are regrouping. Thing is - theres enough pain that folks will be talking about this during thanksgiving; as the republicans are "in charge" they will get more blame most likely. If the shutdown persisted through christmas you can be damn sure that dems would be getting shit. If the republicans don't cede on the ACA then the democrats are going to tell the public that everyone is getting increased healthcare costs for christmas! Furthermore at the end of January they will demand it be put into law regardless; if the republicans refuse then your back into a shutdown as midterms will draw closer and closer everyday and really all the democrats will do is repeat "ACA" and how the mid december vote arguments against it were in bad faith...or hell; if Thune doesn't keep his word then the republicans are basically fucked. permalink parent award report block reply Toohershat 8 points 2 days ago Durbin has aged like Biden. permalink award report block reply Insatiable 8 points 2 days ago Did he say 29 years? I'm speculating here because I haven't gone out to read the relevant sections of the US Code but it would appear that the Dems were concerned that we'd actually get to day 60 if they didn't agree to let the CR pass the Senate, and Donald Trump would have carte blanche to shutter entire agencies at that point, with no more than an agency head and a few trusted deputies left for the next three years. I wanted that outcome. It would've been glorious to reduce the federal payrolls by millions and deal real, permanent damage to the administrative state. permalink parent award report block reply AdmrlNelson 3 points 2 days ago You're not missing anything. Republicans fucked us over yet again. Feckless, worthless, losers. permalink parent award report block reply yarg 3 points 2 days ago Nobody starved.
